v1.headline: Farmer → Yurt → $200K w/ LinkedIn videos | Documenting the messy path to $300K/30hrs
v1.about:
Connor booked $100K in contracts from LinkedIn videos in 3 months.
 
 Before that? Generic posts getting 200 views.
 
 LinkedIn IS full of generic content.
 Here's how we fix that:
 
 Every week, I share everything I know about making creative LinkedIn videos.
 
 You know... to get clients without selling your soul.
 
 No bs (promise)
 
 I also built Video Heroes:
 (literally the only place on LinkedIn where founders can go to make LinkedIn videos that crush)
 
 90+ founders have already transformed their LinkedIn presence:
 • Aidan: $15K to $20K new MRR with 17 videos
 • Jobanmeet: 68 inbound DMs from 14 videos 
 • You: Next success story?
 
 And if you want to work with me
 
 See my featured section.
 
 Enjoy!

ps - I used to be a farmer and I lived in a yurt. Do with that what you will.
